1011100100001100 0110100001010011 1 -> sum: 0010000101100000, cout: 1

0011001110100111 1100010100100001 0 -> sum: 1111100011001000, cout: 0
0101011110010101 1001110011100011 0 -> sum: 1111010001111000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
